Definition: a cold sweet dessert that you eat with a cone or in a bowl
a long and thin piece of potato that you eat with ketchup
a sandwich with meat and cheese and and vegetables
a flat round bread with cheese and vegetables and meat on top and sometimes pineapples
a long sausage that you eat with ketchup and mustard
a piece of bread with meat and cheese and vegetables
a drink that you drink with a straw
a drink that you drink without a straw
